sentence.Network_en: Your words must't transgress the local laws .
sentence.Network_cn: 你的言辞不能违反当地法律。

sentence.Network_en: She obeyed his directions very punctually; perhaps she had no temptation to transgress.
sentence.Network_cn: 她很敏捷地服从他的指示: 也许她没有想违法犯规的心思.

sentence.Network_en: No one is permitted to have privileges to transgress the law.
sentence.Network_cn: 不允许任何人有超越法律的特权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... transfuse 灌输 transgress 逾越,违反,违背 transient 过路,短暂的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... progressive a 进步的 transgress n 超过；违背 transgression n 违法.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... retrogressive 后退的 transgress 逾越,违反 ambition 雄心,热望.
广州cos吧_百度贴吧 ... 我是傻瓜小姐 mm 4-9 越轨 Transgress 4-9 毁灭♀ Kill 4-11.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French transgresser or Latin transgress- 'stepped across', from the verb transgredi, from trans- 'across' + gradi 'go'

entry.def: If someone transgresses, they break a moral law or a rule of behaviour.

example.ex: If a politician transgresses, that is not the fault of the media.
example.tran: 如果政客行为失检，那可不是媒体的责任。

example.ex: ...a monk who had transgressed against the law of celibacy...

means.word_mean: 1. act in disregard of laws and rules;

sentences.sentence: "violate the basic laws or human civilization"

means.word_mean: 2. spread over land, especially along a subsiding shoreline;

sentences.sentence: "The sea transgresses along the West coast of the island"

means.word_mean: 3. commit a sin; violate a law of God or a moral law

auth_sentence.content: Come to understand your limitations, and transgress them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Come to understand your limitations, and transgress them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Come to understand your limitations, and transgress them.

auth_sentence.content: I have an idea you don't transgress enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have an idea you don't transgress enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have an idea you don't transgress enough.

auth_sentence.content: It seems to me that the press will transgress expectations of decency rather often, and the law very occasionally.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems to me that the press will transgress expectations of decency rather often, and the law very occasionally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems to me that the press will transgress expectations of decency rather often, and the law very occasionally.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"变换,改变,转移"; 2. 表示"横过,越过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+it走+ory……的→走过就变→短暂的
trans横过,越过+continental大陆的→adj.横贯大陆的
trans横过,越过+luc光+ent……的→穿过去看到光
trans横过,越过+noraml正常的→adj.超出常规的
trans横过,越过+par看见+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
trans横过,越过+vers转+e→adj.横向的, 横断的
trans变换,改变,转移+action行动→交换行动→交易

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+port运→搬运转移→运输

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘

trans变换,改变,转移+plant种→转移过去→移植
trans变换,改变,转移+scribe写→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→抄写
trans变换,改变,转移+figure形状→改变形状

stems_affixes.value_cn: 改变,变换;变压;转化;改造,改造
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+form形状→改变形状
trans变换,改变,转移+fuse流→[血]流过去→输血
trans变换,改变,转移+mogr怪形状+ify表动词→变成怪形状
trans变换,改变,转移+port运→搬运转移→运输
trans横过,越过+scend爬→爬过→超越
trans横过,越过+sect切→横切
trans横过,越过+gress走→横着走→冒犯
trans横过,越过+mit送→横着送消息→传播

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aggress[v.侵略,进攻]+ive……的→adj.侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
progress[n.进步]+ive……的→adj.进步的,先进的;前进的
ag再+gress走+ion表名词→一再往前走→进攻

stems_affixes.value_cn: [代表]大会;[美国等国的]国会,议会
stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+gress行走,步→走到一起→代表大会
de分开+gree=gress行走,步→分开走→级别→程度,度数

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
stems_affixes.word_buile: digress[v.离题]+ion表名词→n.离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
e出+gress行走,步→走出→出口
in进+gress行走,步→走进
pro向前+gress走→向前走

stems_affixes.value_cn: 违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进

ag再+gress走→一再往前走→进攻

retro向后+gress走→向后走
trans横+gress走→横着走→冒犯
